titleStmt.title: A compassionate invitation of Christian love to all tender-hearted people. Testifying unto [brace] God's free-grace. His spirit's teaching, and good end of man's creation. / By one that has tasted of the goodness of the Lord, William Robinson. London, the 25th of the 2d month, 1692.
titleStmt.author: Robinson, William, member of the Society of Friends.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in: Friends' Library (London, England).
